data.text: He that feareth the Lord will do this;
And as a mother shall she meet him,
With bread of understanding shall she feed him,
He shall be stayed upon her, and shall not be moved;
And she shall exalt him above his neighbours;
He shall inherit joy, and a crown of gladness,
Foolish men shall not obtain her;
She is far from pride;
Praise is not comely in the mouth of a sinner;
For praise shall be spoken in wisdom;
Say not thou, It is through the Lord that I fell away;
Say not thou, It is he that caused me to err;
The Lord hateth every abomination;
He himself made man from the beginning,
If thou wilt, thou shalt keep the commandments;
He hath set fire and water before thee:
Before man is life and death;
For great is the wisdom of the Lord:
And his eyes are upon them that fear him;
He hath not commanded any man to be ungodly;
